text: I can imagine not creating enough supply will make prices increase.  I can also imagine a negative after effects that I can't yet see from maximizing supply.

text: To say nothing of the fact that right now virtually 100% of the funding for building low to moderate income housing comes from the proceeds on market rate developments, so you literally can't have one without the other.
text_html: To say nothing of the fact that right now virtually 100% of the funding for building low to moderate income housing comes from the proceeds on market rate developments, so you literally can't have one without the other.
